CN_CLASS_NAME = #{cnClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CN_CLASS_LOGO = #{cnClassLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
US_CLASS_NAME = #{usClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update TEA_CLASS_INFO set CN_CLASS_NAME = #{cnClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CN_CLASS_LOGO = #{cnClassLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, US_CLASS_NAME = #{usClassName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, US_CLASS_LOGO = #{usClassLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLASS_TYPE = #{classType,jdbcType=CHAR}, INDEX_NO = #{indexNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CLASS_ID = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from TEA_CLASS_INFO
DELETE_FLAG = '0'
and CLASS_TYPE = #{classType,jdbcType=CHAR},
order by INDEX_NO
